svg.content: <mxfile host="www.jianguoyun.com" modified="2020-09-09T14:46:42.186Z" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/85.0.4183.83 Safari/537.36 Edg/85.0.564.44" version="12.4.7" etag="uedYKy3_wkXTTkcINfeP" type="nutstore"><diagram id="9026b367-c43d-59dc-8533-dd78b0df729c" name="第 1 页"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 20px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(59, 87, 166); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 186px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: left;

display: inline-block; font-size: 20px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(59, 87, 166); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 164px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: left;

display: inline-block; font-size: 20px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(59, 87, 166); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 132px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: left;

display: inline-block; font-size: 20px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(59, 87, 166); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 118px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: left;

display: inline-block; font-size: 20px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(59, 87, 166); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 228px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: 脏读：所有事务都可以看见其他事务未提交内容

switch.text: 脏读：所有事务都可以看见其他事务未提交内容

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 20px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(59, 87, 166); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 238px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: 不可重复读：因为其他如果没有互斥锁，那其他事务可能同时在commit，所以当前事务多个select可能返回不同的结果(针对修改操作，即update)

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 20px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(59, 87, 166); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 238px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: 幻读：和不可重复读类似。但是针对增加新数据的问题(insert)

switch.text: 幻读：和不可重复读类似。但是针对增加新数据的问题(insert)

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 20px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(59, 87, 166); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 161px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 20px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(59, 87, 166); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 148px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: 允许事务读取已经提交的数据

switch.text: 允许事务读取已经提交的数据

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 20px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(59, 87, 166); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 328px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: 通过MVCC解决了并发事务下修改的问题(即对事务开始时已存在的记录的读取在整个事务中都不会发生变化)

switch.text: 通过MVCC解决了并发事务下修改的问题(即对事务开始时已存在的记录的读取在整个事务中都不会发生变化)
